Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 4.5.1 Akusalapada » 4.5.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccanīya
Naadhipati
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Naadhipati
44.
1672Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
45.
1673Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1674(Sahajātavārepi…  sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
